text: In nomine domini nostri Ihesu Christi.
Ic Eadnoð bisceop cyðe on þisson gewriton þæt ic onborgedeXXXmancsa goldes be leadgewihte to minre landhreddinge æt beorhnoðe.
& ic gesealde hym ane gyrde landes to underwedde be Cridian to þam forewerdon þæt he hæbbe his dæg & ofer his dæg becweðe þone sceat þam þe him leofost beo þe on þam lande stent.
Ðis sind þa landgemæro þære gyrde be Cridian.

Ærest on Sceocabroces ford, þonne east on herpað on þone lytlan garan easteweardne, suð on þa deadan lace on Cridian, up ongean stream on þone ænlypan æcer, þonne east on herpað eft on Sceocabroces ford.

Ðisses ys to gewitnisse, Cnut cyning & Wulstan arcebisceop & Lifing arcebisceop & Birhtwold bisceop & Eadnoð bisceop & Burewold bisceop & Æðelwine bisceop & Birihtwine bisceop & Æðelwerd ealdorman & Aðelwold abbud & eall se hired on Exancestre & se hired on Cridian tune.
& þis cydde se bisceop þam burhwiton on Exanceastre & to Tottanesse & to Hlidaforda & to Beardastapole.
Pax sit hoc seruantibus & infernus sit hoc frangentibus.
